person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Alexis Blanc and Sebastien Foucras gave France a one-two finish in the first aerials competition of the season .

Let's think step by step.

1. Alexis Blanc
2. Sebastien Foucras

These are the two "Person" entities mentioned in the paragraph. They are identified as the individuals who gave France a one-two finish in the first aerials competition of the season.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Alexis Blanc
2. Sebastien Foucras

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to persons. All other entities, such as "France" and "the first aerials competition of the season," do not refer to specific persons.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

|--------|

| Sebastien Foucras |

These are the valid entities mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column labeled "Person." The entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
